description: Project structure must exist before DI can be configured.
Logging configuration needs the Generic Host for DI.
Authorization service needs the authenticated user session from the Authentication service.
DICOM pixel data must be loaded into a texture hosted by the DirectX control.
mitigation_plan: Ensure DirectX control is stable before starting texture loading.

description: HLSL shaders require a GPU texture to sample from for rendering.
mitigation_plan: Use a placeholder texture for initial shader development.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks visual output of the DICOM viewer.

description: User management CRUD service must call the Audit service to log events.
mitigation_plan: Can develop against an interface with a mock implementation initially.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks completion of the auditable user management feature.
